description: Attention: only compatible on devices with ANDROID WEAR OPERATING SYSTEM.Make your dreams come true now and ever, collect all the seven Dragon Balls and summon the Eternal Dragon, Not official Dragon Ball watch face app.What you see is what you get.V1.4 Now with sound, live the whole experience feeling that you really have the dragon's radar in your hands. descriptionHTML:
Attention: only compatible on devices with ANDROID WEAR OPERATING SYSTEM.

Make your dreams come true now and ever, collect all the seven Dragon Balls and summon the Eternal Dragon, Not official Dragon Ball watch face app.
What you see is what you get.

V1.4 Now with sound, live the whole experience feeling that you really have the dragon's radar in your hands. (Your Smart Watch must have a built-in speaker to enjoy this function).

V1.3 Completely renovated design.
Added step indicator (flying nimbus).
Added battery indicator (capsule N 5).
Changing background day / night.
Every step brings you closer to next sphere.
ShengLong appears when you get all 7 spheres.

1.2 Some bugs fixed.

Previous versions:
1.1 Some bugs fixed.

V1.0 Watch face for round and square clock.
It is interactive (click to change radar zoom).
Includes ambient mode.
It does not include settings tab.
It does not play sounds.
comments: The watchface is working now. But I still haven't been able to summon Shenron. Fix that for 5 stars.
4 stars for now. Needs a bit more info like watch and phone battery life and it should be perfect.
Watch face doesn't at all work on my Zenwatch 3. Just keeps giving me the popup that the application stopped working.
recentChanges: V1.4 Now with sound, live the whole experience feeling that you really have the dragon's radar in your hands. (Your Smart Watch must have a built-in speaker to enjoy this function).
